siteTitle: Zenith Fitness - Reach Your Peak Performance
tagline: Personalized training programs to help you achieve your goals.

about.text: At Zenith Fitness, we believe that a healthy lifestyle is the foundation for success in every area of life. Our certified trainers are dedicated to creating personalized workout and nutrition plans that are effective, sustainable, and designed just for you.

services.title: 1-on-1 Personal Training
services.description: Get dedicated, in-person coaching tailored to your specific fitness level and goals.

services.title: Custom Nutrition Plans
services.description: Fuel your body for success with a comprehensive nutrition guide designed to complement your training.

services.title: Online Coaching
services.description: Access our expert training programs from anywhere in the world with our flexible online platform.

contact.title: Start Your Journey
contact.description: Ready to take the first step towards a healthier, stronger you? Contact us today to schedule a free consultation.
